Sec. 2-103.5. Same—Time of completion.
The time allotted to complete the work for which a permit was issued under shall be limited to the period stipulated on the permit unless the person, firm or corporation to whom the permit was issued requests the Public Works Department for an extension of time, and provided the request is received prior to the time of expiration. If a time extension is needed but not requested until after the expiration of the time originally allotted, a new permit will be required for the uncompleted work. The fee amount for the new permit shall be based upon the uncompleted work.
